summary: Python Developer specializing in building scalable, secure, and maintainable backend systems using Python, Flask, Django, and FastAPI. Experienced in designing REST APIs, handling authentication, role-based access, database architecture with MongoDB and PostgreSQL, and delivering production-ready applications. Passionate about problem-solving, performance optimization, and creating software that delivers real value.

description: Worked as a backend engineer designing and implementing RESTful APIs with Flask
Built robust backend business logic and MongoDB schemas
implemented JWT-based authentication and role-based access control
ensured scalable and maintainable API architecture
implemented pagination, input validation, and robust error handling
Developed Food Delivery API with JWT-based authentication, role-based access control, pagination, input validation, and optimized PostgreSQL queries
Implemented Swagger/OpenAPI for API documentation, ensured robust error handling, and optimized backend performance
Collaborated with frontend developers to deliver production-ready applications and maintained clean, maintainable architectures

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Urban and Regional Planning
Certificate, CS50's Introduction to Programming with Python
Certificate, Udacity Full Stack Developer Nanodegree

projects.title: Innovation Management Platform
projects.description: Backend services for a peer-to-peer innovation management system.

projects.title: Food Delivery API
projects.description: Developed backend services for a food delivery platform using Python (Django), including user, restaurant, order, and dispatch management. Implemented JWT-based authentication, role-based access control, pagination, input validation, error handling, and API documentation.

projects.title: 909ine Command-line Password Manager
projects.description: A user-friendly command-line password manager built in Python with SQLite and SQLAlchemy. Features include registering users, storing encrypted service passwords, JWT-based login, generating strong passwords, and retrieving/updating/deleting credentials. Implements hash & salt for master passwords, secure encryption for service passwords, and input validation for robust security.

projects.title: VisaVision.com
projects.description: A web-based platform built with Python (Flask backend) providing comprehensive insights into H-1B visa applications. Features include employer analysis, approval predictions, reports, and data visualizations. Integrates MongoDB for storage, implements REST APIs, authentication, and scalable backend architecture, and provides AI-powered analytics for users.

achievements: Designed and implemented secure Python REST APIs with scalable architecture
Built 909ine, a full-featured command-line password manager with strong encryption
Developed VisaVision.com backend to handle large datasets and provide AI-powered insights
Delivered production-ready backend solutions integrated with React/Next.js frontends
Documented APIs and backend architecture for maintainability and team collaboration
